KH.content: acc. Hegel, Plato uses myth because he’s impotent, a ludico-mythological drift (dérive), Aristotle Hegel’s guarantor of seriousness
even if Plato is a master for using myth, myth remains subordinate to philosophical theme

btwn text & theme, structure w/out an indivisible origin > theater of irony, w/out end, w/out bottom [abyss]; to isolate a theme, “philosophy-of-Plato,” would be to violently misrecognize, deny textual scene, questions of topology in general

GOD.content: when Patoçka refers to the inadequate thematization of Christian mysterium tremendum, he does so appealing to ultimate adequacy of thematization

SEC.content: for convenience [re: Condillac], Derrida opposes operative concept to thematic one

OS.content: “there is no chance that within the thematic of metaphysics anything might have budged” w/ respect to concept of time, from Aristotle to Hegel > founding concepts sufficed

POS.content: thematic reading as insufficient as a purely formalist one (both ignore genetic, “historical” element)

O.content: neither formalism nor thematism can master irremediable structure of gap btwn empty form/full meaning: will miss it in attempt to master it

REST.content: what is thematic attention? both Shapiro & Heidegger pay no attention to the sex of reattachment, graft of sex onto the shoes

WAP.content: the fold of such supplement of objectification marks a differential limit which could as well apply to thematization (cf. DS)

D.content: one must choose btwn the text & the theme

C.content: a paradigm that is posed as if always there (theme, then, thesis)

TN.content: Derrida obeys thematic focus [for a bit?]

AD.content: neither face nor hospitality can be thematized (what they have in common)

SPEC.content: variation-of-the-trait-in-relation-to-the-object, not only the theme of Symposium but its performance, its condition
